title: E&C Leaders Request Information from Tennessee Valley Authority on Ratepayer Bills and Climate Action
summary: Energy and Commerce leaders request information regarding high electric bills and underinvestment in energy efficiency and renewable power.

title: RESCHEDULED: Hearing on "Securing our Energy Infrastructure: Legislation to Enhance Pipeline Reliability"
Hearing on "Cleaning Up Cryptocurrency: The Energy Impacts of Blockchains"
E&C Announces Oversight Hearing on the Energy Impacts of Cryptocurrency
summary: Chairman Pallone and Oversight and Investigations Chair Diana DeGette announce an oversight hearing on the energy impacts of cryptocurrencies and proof of work blockchains.

title: Pallone Applauds Biden EPA Action on Toxic Coal Ash
summary: Pallone applauds the Biden EPA's actions on mitigating toxic coal ash pollution.
